itemDisplayName: Deploy a Linux VM with multiple IPs
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Linux VM with 3 IP configurations. This template will deploy a Linux Ubuntu 16.04 VM called *myVM1* with 3 IP configurations: *IPConfig-1*, *IPConfig-2* and *IPConfig-3*, respectively.
summary: This template deploys a Ubuntu VM with 3 IP configurations, two of which have public IP addresses associated with them.
